quick_answer.text: One slice of pepperoni pizza provides about 285 kcal, 12 g protein, and 35 g carbs.

faqs.q: How many calories in one slice of pepperoni pizza?
faqs.a: Approximately 285 kcal for a standard slice.

faqs.q: What are the macros for 1 slice of pepperoni pizza?
faqs.a: About 35 g carbs, 12 g protein, 12 g fat, with 2 g fiber.

faqs.q: Is pepperoni pizza high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, one slice has around 700 mg sodium due to cheese and processed meat.

faqs.q: How does crust type affect calories in pepperoni pizza?
faqs.a: Thin crust reduces calories by ~50 per slice; stuffed crust adds ~100.

faqs.q: Are there healthier tweaks for pepperoni pizza calories?
faqs.a: Opt for veggie toppings or less cheese to cut 30-50 kcal per slice.
